overview: Dee shows Scarlet how to explore with an experienced woman. Katie shows Richelle how to sit back and loosen up and have orgasms that she hasn't had in a very long time. Sonny pays a visit to her teacher and puts her sexual moves on Lexi to satisfy her own sexual needs. London seems to think the exchange student program is working for her daughter and doesn't realize Callie, one of her daughter's class mates is in the bedroom suite.
title: Mother-Daughter Exchange Club 63
